author: Jennifer Van Evra
title: Meet the Vancouver filmmaker behind the world's first COVID-19 feature film
description: Mostafa Keshvari got the idea for Corona before billions around the world went into lockdown
content:
They say that timing is everything but that couldn't be truer for Vancouver filmmaker Mostafa Keshvari
As he watched events unfolding in China in January, and the waves of anti-Asian racism and xenophobia that were rippling around the world, the Persian-Cana… [+3051 chars]
